name: A trip to the store (stubbs110)
description:
Title: Name of Game

Platform: Print to Play

Genre: Text adventure

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: It's summertime in Anytown, USA. You're a regular teenager who is given an errand to run for your parents. I wonder what the adventure ahead might hold...

Instructions: Use the attached file to play the game in the browser.
